moves.1. e4: The original way to begin a game.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3: White knight attacks the pawn. Black has a choice to play the philidor defense or the knights game.
moves.2... Nc6: black wants to develop his bishop to c5
moves.3. Bb5: White has a chance to grab the pawn on e5
moves.6. Bc4: White didn't see the trap sprung by qa5. This is the Mortimer trap

opening: Ruy Lopez (C65), Berlin defence, Mortimer trap
